title: Transformation
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

**Transformations** are effects that completely alter the form of a creature's body. Most forms are willingly caused to help the player, but a few [bad forms](/Bad_form "Bad form") exist.

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Table of Transformations](#Table_of_Transformations)
  - [2.1 Talisman Forms](#Talisman_Forms)
- [3 History](#History)

## Useful Info

There are two major types of transformations:

- [Talisman](/Talisman "Talisman") forms: Forms that use [Shapeshifting](/Shapeshifting "Shapeshifting") skill. These are permanent, but can be overridden by a temporary form, and manually ended at will.
- Temporary forms: Includes [bad forms](/Bad_form "Bad form") and [Shadow Form](/Shadow_Form "Shadow Form"). These forms end after a certain amount of time - they cannot be ended manually. However, they can be ended early by a [potion of cancellation](/Potion_of_cancellation "Potion of cancellation") and [Quicksilver Bolt](/Quicksilver_Bolt "Quicksilver Bolt") (the latter leaves 1 turn left on the duration).

Transmutations can cause the following changes, depending on the form:

- Modify [Unarmed Combat](/Unarmed_Combat "Unarmed Combat")
- Have innate properties, like bonus HP, AC, stats, or resistances.
- Have a different [size](/Size "Size") or [movement speed](/Movement_speed "Movement speed") to your base form
- Meld certain types of equipment. Melded equipment ceases to have any effect, positive or negative. Melded items are not unequipped, rendering you safe from an [artefact](/Artefact "Artefact")'s Drain and Contam.

Being in any form will also make you vulnerable to [silver](/Silver "Silver") weaponry (+75% damage from silver weapons)

[Undead](/Undead "Undead") creatures cannot be transformed *except for [Shadow Form](/Shadow_Form "Shadow Form"). For players, this means that [Ghouls](/Ghoul "Ghoul") and [Mummies](/Mummies "Mummies") can never be transformed, while [Vampires](/Vampire "Vampire") can only be transformed when Alive. [Death Form](/Death_Form "Death Form") renders you immune to temporary forms, but you can still use other talismans.*

Monsters cannot transform; any transformation effect will instead [polymorph](/Polymorph "Polymorph") the creature permanently.

## Table of Transformations

### Talisman Forms

| Form                                         | Skill | Melded Gear                 | Offense                                                                                                                         | Defense                                            | Resist                                                                                            | Other                                                                                                                    |
| -------------------------------------------- | ----- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [Beast Form](/Beast_Form "Beast Form")       | 0-7   | Helmet Cloak Gloves Boots   | +0-4 [slaying](/Slay "Slay")                                                                                                    | 100% HP                                            | -                                                                                                 | -                                                                                                                        |
| [Flux Form](/Flux_Form "Flux Form")          | 7-14  | Weapon & shield Body armour | ×66% melee dmg First hit on foe: [Corona](/Corona "Corona") Third hit on foe: [malmutate](/Malmutate "Malmutate"), extra damage | 100% HP +4 [EV](/EV "EV")                          | -                                                                                                 | Cannot go [invisible](/Invisible "Invisible") ×0.4 [stealth](/Stealth "Stealth") Cannot [throw](/Throw "Throw") items    |
| [Blade Form](/Blade_Form "Blade Form")       | 10-19 | Weapon & shield Gloves      | 15-23 UC base damage +6 Offhand punch damage                                                                                    | 100% HP Lose 100%-0% AC from body armour           | -                                                                                                 | Cannot [throw](/Throw "Throw") items                                                                                     |
| [Maw Form](/Maw_Form "Maw Form")             | 10-19 | Body armour                 | 5 UC base damage Maw [auxiliary attack](/Auxiliary_attack "Auxiliary attack")                                                   | 100% HP                                            | -                                                                                                 | Heal on kill                                                                                                             |
| [Serpent Form](/Serpent_Form "Serpent Form") | 10-19 | Weapon & shield All armour  | 10 UC base damage [Constriction](/Constriction "Constriction") +5 [strength](/Strength "Strength")                              | 120% HP 9-15 AC                                    | rPois [Amphibious](/Amphibious "Amphibious")                                                      | Sets move delay to 1.0 [Cold blooded](/Cold_blooded "Cold blooded") [Large](/Large "Large")                              |
| [Dragon Form](/Dragon_Form "Dragon Form")    | 16-23 | Weapon & shield All armour  | 24-33 UC base damage 2 [auxiliary attacks](/Auxiliary_attack "Auxiliary attack") +10 [strength](/Strength "Strength")           | 150% HP 12-18 AC                                   | rF++ rC- rPois                                                                                    | Breathe Fire ability Sets move delay to 1.0 [Giant](/Size#Giant "Size"), [Flying](/Flying "Flying")                      |
| [Statue Form](/Statue_Form "Statue Form")    | 16-23 | Body armour Gloves Boots    | 12 UC base damage ×150% melee dmg                                                                                               | 130% HP 27-38 AC                                   | rPois∞ rElec rN+ rTorm r[Petrify](/Petrify "Petrify") [Nonliving](/Nonliving "Nonliving")         | All actions ×150% slower Sets move delay to 1.0 (slowed to 1.5) Vuln. to [LRD](/LRD "LRD")/[Shatter](/Shatter "Shatter") |
| [Death Form](/Death_Form "Death Form")       | 23-27 | None                        | 9 UC base damage Melee inflicts [slow](/Slow "Slow"), [drained](/Drain "Drain"), [weak](/Weak "Weak")                           | 100% HP                                            | rC+ rPois∞ rN+++ rTorm∞ Will+ [Undead](/Undead "Undead")                                          | Siphon Essence ability                                                                                                   |
| [Storm Form](/Storm_Form "Storm Form")       | 23-27 | Weapon & shield All armour  | 24-30 UC base damage [Electrocution](/Electrocution "Electrocution"), [cleaving](/Cleaving "Cleaving")                          | 100% HP 12-15 [AC](/AC "AC") +20-27 [EV](/EV "EV") | rPois∞ rElec [Insubstantial](/Insubstantial "Insubstantial"), [Nonliving](/Nonliving "Nonliving") | Blinkbolt ability Sets move delay to 1.0 [Flying](/Flying "Flying")                                                      |

Bad Forms:

| Form                                      | Melded Gear                              | Offense                                                     | Defense                     | Resist                                                                                   | Other                                                                                       |
| ----------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Bat Form](/Bat_Form "Bat Form")          | Weapon & shield All armour Rings         | 1 UC base damage 20% dmg from skill                         | 100% HP                     | -                                                                                        | Move delay set to 0.6 No spellcasting [Tiny](/Size#Tiny "Size"), [Flying](/Flying "Flying") |
| [Fungus Form](/Fungus_Form "Fungus Form") | Weapon & shield All armour Rings         | 12 UC base damage [Confusion](/Confusion "Confusion") melee | 100% HP                     | rPois rTorm∞                                                                             | Move delay set to 1.0 Cannot move if foe in sight [Tiny](/Size#Tiny "Size")                 |
| [Pig Form](/Pig_Form "Pig Form")          | Weapon & shield All armour Rings         | 1 UC base damage 20% dmg from skill                         | 100% HP                     | -                                                                                        | Move delay set to 0.7 No spellcasting [Little](/Size#Little "Size")                         |
| [Tree Form](/Tree_Form "Tree Form")       | All armour                               | 12 UC base damage                                           | 150% HP 20 + XL/2 AC EV = 2 | rPois rTorm∞ rDrown                                                                      | Cannot move Cannot [teleport](/Teleport "Teleport") or [blink](/Blink "Blink")              |
| [Wisp Form](/Wisp_Form "Wisp Form")       | Weapon & shield All armour All jewellery | 5 + XL/2 UC                                                 | 100% HP 5 + XL/2 AC         | rF++ rC++ rPois∞ rElec rN+++ rTorm rCorr [Insubstantial](/Insubstantial "Insubstantial") | No spellcasting [Flying](/Flying "Flying")                                                  |

Misc Forms:

| Form                                      | Melded Gear | Offense                                                 | Defense                                                       | Resist                             | Other                                                                                                           |
| ----------------------------------------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Shadow Form](/Shadow_Form "Shadow Form") | None        | ×50% melee dmg [Spellpower](/Spellpower "Spellpower")-- | 100% HP ×50% damage taken [Invisible](/Invisible "Invisible") | rPois∞ rN+++ rTorm∞ Will∞ rPetrify | Create [smoke](/Fog "Fog") when damaged [Drained](/Drain "Drain") when damaged ×2 [stealth](/Stealth "Stealth") |

## History

- In [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), transformations were reworked. [Transmutations](/Transmutations "Transmutations") magic was replaced by [talismans](/Talisman "Talisman"), which use [Shapeshifting](/Shapeshifting "Shapeshifting") skill. Removed forms include [Beastly Appendage](/Beastly_Appendage "Beastly Appendage"), [Spider Form](/Spider_Form "Spider Form"), and [Ice Form](/Ice_Form "Ice Form"); the other good forms were largely overhauled.
- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), plant based forms had 3 levels of [Life Protection](/Life_Protection "Life Protection").
- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), many forms had dedicated [GDR](/GDR "GDR") ratios. Also, [Hydra Form](/Hydra_Form "Hydra Form") was replaced with Storm Form.
- Prior to [0.22](/0.22 "0.22"), most forms could not use wands.
- Prior to [0.20](/0.20 "0.20"), wands of polymorph could polymorph the player into most forms, not just the five bad forms. Porcupine form was removed in 0.20.
- Hydra Form was added in [0.16](/0.16 "0.16").
- Shadow Form was added with [Dithmenos](/Dithmenos "Dithmenos") in [0.14](/0.14 "0.14").

|                                   | [Transformations]()                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| --------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Talisman](/Talisman "Talisman")  | [Beast Form](/Beast_Form "Beast Form") • [Flux Form](/Flux_Form "Flux Form") • [Blade Form](/Blade_Form "Blade Form") • [Maw Form](/Maw_Form "Maw Form") • [Serpent Form](/Serpent_Form "Serpent Form") • [Dragon Form](/Dragon_Form "Dragon Form") • [Statue Form](/Statue_Form "Statue Form") • [Death Form](/Death_Form "Death Form") • [Storm Form](/Storm_Form "Storm Form") |
| [Bad Forms](/Bad_Form "Bad Form") | [Bat Form](/Bat_Form "Bat Form") • [Fungus Form](/Fungus_Form "Fungus Form") • [Pig Form](/Pig_Form "Pig Form") • [Tree Form](/Tree_Form "Tree Form") • [Wisp Form](/Wisp_Form "Wisp Form")                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [Divine](/God "God")              | [Shadow Form](/Shadow_Form "Shadow Form")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
html:
Transformation

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

Transformations are effects that completely alter the form of a creature's body. Most forms are willingly caused to help the player, but a few bad forms exist.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Table of Transformations
    • 2.1 Talisman Forms
  • 3 History

Useful Info

There are two major types of transformations:

  • Talisman forms: Forms that use Shapeshifting skill. These are permanent, but can be overridden by a temporary form, and manually ended at will.
  • Temporary forms: Includes bad forms and Shadow Form. These forms end after a certain amount of time - they cannot be ended manually. However, they can be ended early by a potion of cancellation and Quicksilver Bolt (the latter leaves 1 turn left on the duration).

Transmutations can cause the following changes, depending on the form:

  • Modify Unarmed Combat
  • Have innate properties, like bonus HP, AC, stats, or resistances.
  • Have a different size or movement speed to your base form
  • Meld certain types of equipment. Melded equipment ceases to have any effect, positive or negative. Melded items are not unequipped, rendering you safe from an artefact's Drain and Contam.

Being in any form will also make you vulnerable to silver weaponry (+75% damage from silver weapons)

Undead creatures cannot be transformed except for Shadow Form. For players, this means that Ghouls and Mummies can never be transformed, while Vampires can only be transformed when Alive. Death Form renders you immune to temporary forms, but you can still use other talismans.

Monsters cannot transform; any transformation effect will instead polymorph the creature permanently.

History

  • In 0.31, transformations were reworked. Transmutations magic was replaced by talismans, which use Shapeshifting skill. Removed forms include Beastly Appendage, Spider Form, and Ice Form; the other good forms were largely overhauled.
  • Prior to 0.28, plant based forms had 3 levels of Life Protection.
  • Prior to 0.27, many forms had dedicated GDR ratios. Also, Hydra Form was replaced with Storm Form.
  • Prior to 0.22, most forms could not use wands.
  • Prior to 0.20, wands of polymorph could polymorph the player into most forms, not just the five bad forms. Porcupine form was removed in 0.20.
  • Hydra Form was added in 0.16.
  • Shadow Form was added with Dithmenos in 0.14.
Transformations
Talisman Beast Form • Flux Form • Blade Form • Maw Form • Serpent Form • Dragon Form • Statue Form • Death Form • Storm Form
Bad Forms Bat Form • Fungus Form • Pig Form • Tree Form • Wisp Form
Divine Shadow Form

{{version031}} '''Transformations''' are effects that completely alter the form of a creature's body. Most forms are willingly caused to help the player, but a few [[bad form]]s exist. ==Useful Info== There are two major types of transformations: *[[Talisman]] forms: Forms that use [[Shapeshifting]] skill. These are permanent, but can be overridden by a temporary form, and manually ended at will. *Temporary forms: Includes [[bad form]]s and [[Shadow Form]]. These forms end after a certain amount of time - they cannot be ended manually. However, they can be ended early by a [[potion of cancellation]] and [[Quicksilver Bolt]] (the latter leaves 1 turn left on the duration). Transmutations can cause the following changes, depending on the form: *Modify [[Unarmed Combat]] *Have innate properties, like bonus HP, AC, stats, or resistances. *Have a different [[size]] or [[movement speed]] to your base form *Meld certain types of equipment. Melded equipment ceases to have any effect, positive or negative. Melded items are not unequipped, rendering you safe from an [[artefact]]'s Drain and Contam. Being in any form will also make you vulnerable to [[silver]] weaponry (+75% damage from silver weapons) [[Undead]] creatures cannot be transformed ''except for [[Shadow Form]]. For players, this means that [[Ghoul]]s and [[Mummies]] can never be transformed, while [[Vampire]]s can only be transformed when Alive. [[Death Form]] renders you immune to temporary forms, but you can still use other talismans.
